name: The Backrooms (Found Footage)
description:
Welcome my name is William, I'm 18 and this is my first game, this game is in a very alpha state and many levels are to come, this is a small demo, completely heavily inspired by Kane Pixels, please check him out on Youtube, Thank you for trying my game, feel free to leave any feedback

If you really like this game, feel free to donate, it would really speed up the making of this game, I have plenty of ideas for this game  

WASD - Walk

Shift - Sprint

Right Click - Zoom in/out
